item.title: Projects
item.description:
These projects are my personal explorations and practice exercises in Power BI. If you‚Äôre interested in my professional experience or would like to collaborate, feel free to get in touch!

üç´ Sales Analytics Tracking Dashboard Link to heading

Overview:
A Power BI solution for the Chocolate Ecommerce Company, providing insights into sales performance, profitability, and operational efficiency.

Key Features:

  • Total Sales, Costs, Profit %, Shipments, and more.
  • Product performance by categories and markets.
  • Salesperson analysis with interactive visuals.

Techniques and Tools:
